Isaiah or Isaias__33.1__That spoilest: : This is particularly directed to Sennacherib.
Isaiah or Isaias__33.7__The angels of peace: : The messengers or deputies sent to negotiate a peace.
Isaiah or Isaias__33.21__Of rivers: : He speaks of the rivers of endless joys that flow from the throne of God to water the heavenly Jerusalem, where no enemy's ship can come, etc.
Isaiah or Isaias__33.23__Thy tacklings: : He speaks of the enemies of the church, under the allegory of a ship that is disabled.
